review.title: “A company that made me feel as though I had part ownership.”
review.pros: Pros – Automomous responsibility for many aspects of the day to day operations of the company.
review.cons: Cons – Difficult working with a company owner who has multiple limitations and reaches out to place blame for his shortcomings.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Recognize your inability to lead by example and to compliment those that have made you successful.
